pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dbt plugin for SQLFluffThis plugin works with [SQLFluff](https://pypi.org/project/sqlfluff/), theSQL linter for humans, to correctly parse and compile SQL projects using[dbt](https://pypi.org/project/dbt/).For more details on how to use this plugin,[see the documentation](https://docs.sqlfluff.com/en/stable/configuration.html#dbt-project-configuration).
